name: TreeSaplings-Revisted-RevivePatch
title: Tree Saplings (Revisited+RevivePatch)
author: Original by LukeM, Hacked to 1.1 by JustJinxed, RevivePatch by rocketridah
description: A small mod that adds craftable saplings that grow into vanilla trees, and a way to farm them. This includes a patch to make the mod work in 1.1 when bots, scripts or blueprints create planters/saplings.
